name: consistent_comic
prompt_prefix: western graphic novel style, gritty noir illustration, heavy black ink lines, muted desaturated colors, rough texture, realistic facial proportions, serious tone, Frank Miller style, Mike Mignola style
negative_prompt: anime, manga, studio ghibli, disney, pixar, vibrant colors, soft lighting, glowing, cute, pretty, smooth skin, big eyes, cartoon, whimsical, fantasy, 3d render, plastic, superhero, bright neon
character_bible: Design: Weary expression, realistic imperfections, grime, workman clothes, hard shadows on face
camera_bible: Composition: Low angle, claustrophobic framing, harsh rim lighting
palette_bible: Colors: Desaturated blues, sickly greens, deep blacks, high contrast, almost monochromatic
